mapper.sql: s.Suggest_Id Suggest_Id, s.Suggest_Name Suggest_Name, s.Dept_Id, s.AddName, s.AddTime, s.UpdateName, s.UpdateTime, s.DeleteName, s.DeleteTime, s.TimeLiness
d.Dept_Id, d.Dept_Name, d.Dept_SortNumber, d.Superiors_Dept_Id, d.AddName, d.AddTime, d.UpdateName, d.UpdateTime, d.DeleteName, d.DeleteTime, d.TimeLiness
mapper.select: select , from Suggest s inner join Dept d on s.Dept_Id=d.Dept_Id where s.Suggest_Id = #{suggestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select , from Suggest s inner join Dept d on s.Dept_Id=d.Dept_Id where
s.Suggest_Name like concat('%',concat(#{suggestName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and s.TimeLiness=0 order by s.Suggest_Id
select , from Suggest s inner join Dept d on s.Dept_Id=d.Dept_Id where s.TimeLiness=0
mapper.insert:
insert into Suggest
Suggest_Name,
Dept_Id,
AddName,
AddTime,
UpdateName,
UpdateTime,
DeleteName,
DeleteTime,
#{suggestName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update Suggest
Suggest_Name = #{suggestName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Dept_Id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AddName = #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Suggest_Id = #{suggestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Suggest set Suggest_Name = #{suggestName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Dept_Id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AddName = #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TimeLiness = #{timeliness,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Suggest_Id = #{suggestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update Suggest set DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TimeLiness = 1 where Suggest_Id = #{suggestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Suggest
Suggest_Name = #{suggestName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Dept_Id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UpdateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Suggest_Id = #{suggestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
